result.markdown:
--- title: "Jumbo Phages" date: 2022-09-12 format: html: code-fold: true code-summary: "Show the code" highlight-style: github code-block-border-left: true code-copy: true execute: freeze: auto --- # Jumbophage genomes ::: {.cell} ::: ::: {.justify} Tailed phages with genomes larger than 200 kbp are classified as jumbo phages. Currently there are **27321** bacteriophage genomes in the NCBI and only **2.25%** of them are are classified as jumbo phages. :::
::: {.cell layout-align="center" fig-heigth='7'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) base_color <- c("#d8b365", "#5ab4ac") read_tsv("rawdata/clean_genomes_data.tsv") %>% select(jumbophage) %>% count(jumbophage) %>% mutate(jumbophage = if_else(jumbophage == FALSE, "No Jumbo Phage", "Jumbo Phage" )) %>% ggplot(aes( x = jumbophage, y = n, fill = jumbophage )) + geom_col() + scale_y_continuous( expand = c(0, 0), limits = c(0, 30000), breaks = seq(0, 300000, 3000) ) + geom_text( aes( x = jumbophage, y = (n + 1500), label = n ), size = 6 ) + labs( x = NULL, y = "Number of phages" ) + scale_fill_manual(values = base_color) + theme( text = element_text(size = 20), panel.background = element_blank(), panel.border = element_rect( colour = "black", fill = NA, linewidth = 1 ), legend.position = "none" ) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} ![](jumbophages_files/figure-html/unnamed-chunk-2-1.png){fig-align='center' width=480} ::: :::
